typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Book_Id as string,
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as string,
		Title as string,
		Author as string,
		{Author_l-f} as string,
		Additional_Authors as string,
		Average_Rating as string,
		Publisher as string,
		Binding as string,
		Number_of_Pages as string,
		Year_Published as string,
		Original_Publication_Year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> BooksCSV
